Brooklyn Historical Society
Jeremiah Johnson manuscript
Field, Thomas W.
1974.065
1 item 1 folder in box A0043
1850 A manuscript titled, "Recollections of Incidences of the Revolution of the Colonies Occurring in Brooklyn, Collated from the Manuscripts and Conversations of General Jeremiah Johnson, Descriptive of Scenes Which he Personally Witnessed." Arranged and edited by Thomas W. Field in one volume. Follows the history of churches in Flatbush and the Flatlands in the late 18th and early 19th century, as well as the relationship between clergymen and politicians. Book has binding of Kings County Reformed Dutch Church on side. A0043
Conditions Governing Access
This collection is availalble for research with no restrictions.
Conditions Governing Use
This collection is in the public domain.
